subject: Football
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: This year’s version of the N.F.L. draft was an entertaining combination of game show and reality series, and the two game 7s in the N.H.L. were simply compelling reality.
snippet: This year’s version of the N.F.L. draft was an entertaining combination of game show and reality series, and the two game 7s in the N.H.L. were simply compelling reality.
